title: Add New Child
content:
Finding the Form There are three ways to get to the new child form in OpenEMR:
 The “Search or Add Child” tab is open by default, just click on the Tab Title. On the Children List tab (the default tab) you can click the “Add Child” button. You can also hover over the “Child” menu option and click “New/Search”.  Search or Add Child The only optional field on the form is Sex, which can be left Unassigned. All other fields are required.
Once all data is entered, click the “Save New Child” button.
Possible Duplicates OpenEMR automatically checks for duplicate patients. A popup is shown.
No Duplicates If there are no possible duplicates, click on “Confirm New Patient”
Possible Duplicates If there are possible duplicates, they will be listed in the popup. Clicking on the row will take you to the suggested patient. Clicking “Confirm New Patient” will create the patient, ignoring the alert.

Azul Wasi OpenEMR Pocket Guide OpenEMR is an electronic medical record software, provided by Providence HealthTech which has been customized to meet the needs of the Azul Wasi orphanage. This guide walks through the most common tasks in the software including adding new children, finding children, and entering allergies, medical problems, and other pertinant information.
 Add New Child     Medical Record Dashboard    Allergy Management     Immunizations     Medical Problems      Encounters    Anthropometric Measurements     New Encounter     Vital Signs      Getting Help
